job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_details.full_text:
Front End Developer

As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development and exposing existing functionality to customers. While it mentions generative AI as a domain, it lacks specific tasks related to building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, which are core to ML or GenAI Engineer roles.

phrases: As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers.
The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology.
Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.

You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes building user-facing functionality, exposing existing capabilities, and developing interfaces, which are core software development activities for a front-end engineer.

phrases: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.
increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding how to make generative AI concepts accessible and valuable to specific businesses, focusing on customer adoption and product market fit.

phrases: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment
soft_skills.justification: The role requires close collaboration with various teams like product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers.

phrases: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.
soft_skills.justification: The role involves finding practical ways to make complex technology accessible and valuable to customers, focusing on adoption and value.

phrases: state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology
highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality
soft_skills.justification: The description highlights working with cutting-edge technology in a dynamic environment, implying a need for continuous learning and adaptation.
